That's because the site is never updated.  It just sits there dormant  
looking stupid.
 
 
In a message dated 8/12/2008 5:27:44 P.M. Central Standard Time,  
cawiggins78@... writes:

 
 
 
The website, www.paranormalunderThe website, www.paranormalunder<WBR>world
event advertised that was supposed to take place in July of this  year.
What's up with that?

--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
"shadow71414" <shadow71414@sha> wrote:
>
> I would like  to make all aware that paranormal underworld no longer
> exist, nor dose  on line production . This was my creation. I had the
> idea and ,  brought it to the paranormal community . We have not done a
> alive  event in over 2 year. Nor has there been attempt. It was a
> great  concept. But unfortunately it never took off . I will not have
> my name  associated with something that boarders on fraud. 
> I am more than  willing to share the temp plates , and the
> technology, and what is  needed at the location, and how I set this
> up for free .I will gladly  explain what server I used, and how to 
> present a event what equipment  that is required, and how it was
> promoted , also I will tell you the  problems I ran in to so you can
> avoid them, as well as what I enjoyed  about this, my experience is at
> your disposal, all I ask for is a  invite to the event . 
> If any one is interested you can contact me  at
> shadow71414@ shadow71414@<WBR>... I will do my best to get bac
> hours. Or I am more than willing to give my cell number out and I  do
> return calls promptly .
> 
> Joel  Collins
>
